modName: Armor Of The True Listener - The leader of the Dark Brotherhood
summary: This mod adds armor and weapons themed by a leader of the Dark brotherhood - the Listener
descriptionHtml:
Armor can be found under the word wall in Dark brotherhood sanctuary. It is considered light armor and has it´s own unique enchantments. Has the same stats as nightingale armor set. Weapons has the same stats as the nightingale weapons and arrows has the same stats as daedric. Perfect armor for high level assassin characters. 
<br /><br />
<br /><br />Bugs/issues:
<br /><br />My alternative texture doesn´t appear on hood and bow and sword and it appears just like normal nightingale hood and weapons, although I have linked it in creation kit. If anyone know how to fix it, I would be grateful and updated this mod.
<br /><br />
<br /><br />Credits:
<br /><br />I´d really like to thank to vatakc for making original torso meshes for this armor set.
author: vatakc with skyrimgamer000
